sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
hardens
, postane trdo ali trdno.

seg.quote: The glue dries very fast and hardens in an hour.

sense.def:
Kadar zamisli ali vedênje
harden
, postanejo utrjeni in človek se odloči, da jih ne bo spremenil.

seg.quote: The organization has hardened its attitude to the crisis.
It would almost certainly result in a hardening of Allied opposition and determination.

sense.def:
Kadar dogodki
harden people
ali kadar ljudje
harden
, pomeni, da ljudje postanejo manj polni razumevanja in dobrote, kot so bili prej.

seg.quote: Life in the camp had hardened her considerably.
